data.text:
TOKYO, Japan - Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi tells reporters at his office in Tokyo on May 10 the issue of ministers failing to pay their pension premiums should be dealt with by improving the system. He made the remarks after Democratic Party of Japan leader Naoto Kan said he will step down from his party post for having failed to pay pension dues. (Kyodo)

Captions are provided by our contributors.
